summary: Marion and Jack try to rekindle their relationship with a visit to Paris, home of Marion's parents -- and several of her ex-boyfriends.
cast: Adam Goldberg|Julie Delpy|Daniel Brühl|Marie Pillet|Albert Delpy|Alexia Landeau|Adan Jodorowsky|Alexandre Nahon|Charlotte Maury-Sentier|Vanessa Seward|Thibault De Lussy|Chick Ortega|Patrick Chupin|Antar Boudache|Ludovic Berthillot|Hubert Toint|Sandra Berrebi|Arnaud Beunaiche|René-Alban Fleury|Pierre Alloggia|Jean-François Perrone|Bela Grushka|Claude Harold|Bulut Oktay|Frédérick Guillaud|Benjamin Baroche|Jean-Baptiste Puech|Clément Rouault|Mme Marchand|Josette Schwindling|Nanou Benhamou|Julien Bichet|Pascal Stencel|Sylvain Menage|Silvio Bolino|Manuel Cortell|Soraya Mangin|Julie Bouvier|Marie Drion|Jean-Michel Roux|Eric Giriat|Judith Lia|Emma Piesse|Sébastien Juy|Federico De Aboim Inglez|Till Bahlmann|Corinne Visery|Max|Medi Holtrop|Bernard Willem|Michel Hermon|Cécile Dury|Janine Mossuz-Lavau|Chantal Banlier|Maryline Even|Monique Couturier|Eric Moquet|Fanny Masson|Julia Vidit|Emmanuel Matte|Bruno Sermonne|Tonia|Martine Van Der Schueren|Patrice De Vallée|Azertyuiop|Leonie Kranzle|Verónica Redondo Moreno|Dolly West
title: 2 días en París
